name: Monkey.D.Luffy
text: When Attacking: You may trash 1 card from your hand. Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 4 or less to the owner's hand. Then, give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader or Character.

effect.text: You may trash 1 card from your hand. Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 4 or less to the owner's hand. Then, give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader or Character.
